top.author: @MillieMarconnni
top.text: Here's why your prompts suck: You: "Write a professional email" AI: *writes generic corporate bullshit* You: "Be more creative" AI: *adds exclamation marks* You're giving vibes, not instructions. The AI is guessing what you want. Guessing = garbage output.
top.translationZh:
你的prompt为什么这么烂：

你："写一封专业邮件"
AI：*写出套路化的企业废话*

你："再创意一点"  
AI：*加几个感叹号*

你给的是感觉，不是指令。AI在猜你想要什么。猜测=垃圾输出。

top.author: @itsNavasz
top.text: I found a connection in both email and productivity. same mistakes. Most productivity advice says: – do more – plan better – optimize everything Most email advice says: – send more – write better – test subject lines Both ignore the real issue: Too much activity. no system.
top.translationZh:
我发现邮件和效率管理有个共同点，都在犯同样的错误。

大多数效率建议都是：
- 做更多事
- 计划得更好  
- 优化一切

大多数邮件建议都是：
- 发更多邮件
- 写得更好
- 测试主题行

但都忽略了真正的问题：活动太多，没有系统。

top.author: @maruf_Emon05
top.text: Bounce rate is more dangerous than most realize. Every bounce tells inbox providers: “This sender doesn’t know their audience.” Healthy limits: • Hard bounce < 2% • Total bounce < 5% High bounce = faster reputation damage than spam complaints.
top.translationZh:
退信率比大多数人想象的更危险。每次退信都在告诉邮箱服务商："这个发件人根本不了解自己的用户。" 

健康标准：
• 硬退信 < 2%
• 总退信率 < 5%

高退信率对发件人信誉的损害比垃圾邮件投诉还要快。
